name: R&R SQL Report Writer Report File
summary: Standalone SQL Report Writer definition file used by R&R ReportWorks, a program for designing reports for data stored in Xbase ( .DBF ) and SQL databases; saved in an SQL compound file format; used by Windows SQL editions Arpeggio and later.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Liveware Publishing R&R SQL Report Writer
